story_01_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
That was impressive, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re way better than I expected!
story_01_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’d be more than happy to join your team,
if you’ll have me! 
You didn’t change your minds, did you?!
story_01_03000/2401_0301_0300_10: Nope! Glad to have you on board!
story_01_03000/2401_0401_0400_10:
Yay! Thank you, thank you! Oh gosh, this is
so exciting! I promise I’ll give it my all!
story_01_03000/2401_0302_0500_10: Nah. We’ll be counting on you!
story_01_03000/2401_0402_0600_10:
Absolutely! You can count on me for sure!
I promise I’ll give this my best shot!
story_01_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Oh! Speaking of which, I should introduce
you all to my new friend, Barry!
We met here on Pasio.
story_01_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
OK, that sounds good.
As they say, the more the merrier!
story_01_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
The last time I saw him, he said he’d be
heading to the beach for a while!
story_01_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I can take you there, if you want!
Come on! Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
